---
title: "Network effects of neuropsychiatric disorders"

The project aims to use convex optimization methods to understand 
the network effects of neuropsychiatric disorders.

My daily researach journal at the NYGC is also available 
[online](https://banskt.github.io/nygc-notes/).
To learn more about my work and research interests,
please visit my main [portfolio website](https://saik.at).
